short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access to to the official Telegram (web version) in a stand-alone window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our extension Telegram for Chrome is one of the most famous social networks today.  With it, you can easily communicate online with your relatives and friends.  You can also call them with calls and video calls, send stickers, emoticons and so on.  We hope that you will not have any problems using our product.  We made everything as convenient as possible, and most importantly, Telegram for Chrome is an absolutely free extension.Install Telegram for Chrome right now and join our users.  And you can do this using the link below.
